context.content: "Shutter Island (2010)" is a psychological thriller directed by Martin Scorsese. The movie follows two U.S. Marshals as they investigate the disappearance of a patient from a mental institution on a remote island. The film is emotionally intense and thought-provoking, with a chilling and suspenseful atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
